author: oheger
msg: Reworked chapter about CompositeConfiguration in user's guide.

author: oheger
msg: Added a test case for saving to a newly created file.
It is tested whether the allowFailOnInit flag is evaluated, so that a
configuration can be created and associated with a not yet existing file.
Later on, the configuration is saved to this file.

author: markt
msg: Backport change that added generics to Endpoint (needed for a backport to follow)
Create AbstractEndpoint.processSocketAsync() which will enable some further refactoring in the AJP processors.
This requires adding generics to the endpoint so this patch also deals with the side effects of adding generics.

author: hashutosh
msg: HIVE-7226 : Windowing Streaming mode causes NPE for empty partitions (Harish Butani via Ashutosh Chauhan)
